# Two Populations Means {#ch.2pops}

## Learning Objectives for Chapter

1. Compare two population means based on two samples.
1. Determine if samples are paired or unpaired ("independent") when comparing two means.
1. Describe the three cases for comparing two populations means and determine when each one applies.
1. Perform a test of homogeneity of variance using samples from two populations.
